name: New Fragrance!!  Evening Whisper
description:
Don't forget to select Free Gift Wrapping for your order, today only!

A perfect candle for the bedroom!

Our newest fragrance is a blend of Ylang-Ylang, Geranium, Palmrosa and Lavender. These sweet floral aromas are known for their sensuous aphrodisiac qualities! They also are commonly used to relieve tention, lower blood pressure, and create balance.

name: Gift Wrapping
description:
Nothing to do but give!

Each candle box will be wrapped individually (even the 2pk 8oz will be in 2 boxes and wrapped seperately!) to make your gift giving even easier this holiday season!


**Paper used for gift wrap may be different than shown**

name: Lavender Lullaby
description:
Don't forget to select Free Gift Wrapping for your order, today only!

Relax the day away with the soothing fragrance of lavender. Mixed with Peru Balsam this candle gives off a softened lavender fragrance that warms the air with a beautiful relaxing frangrance.

Lavender very effective for calming nervousness, treating depression and melancholy, balancing your mood, helping with insomnia, and is even know to relieve headaches.
This fragrance is a must for every home!!

Makes for a great Holiday Hostess Gift!

All of our candles are made with 100% essential oils and natural soy.

*To choose a 100% natural candle please select WHITE (no color dye) as your color option. Our dyes are made of a natural plant base but are not 100% natural. .*

FREE UPS GROUND SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS $100 OR MORE 
(Continental US Only)

name: Peppermint Bliss
description:
Don't forget to select Free Gift Wrapping for your order, today only!

Revel in the scent of Peppermint!

The sweet smell of peppermint throughout your home will help to elevate you mood and increase your concentration. Put one in your office to maintain focus. 
This candle is also perfect for those that want a holiday fragrance, but want to move away from the traditional pine!

Makes for a great Holiday Hostess Gift!


All of our candles are made with 100% essential oils and natural soy.

*This candle is only availale in White- 100% Natural*

FREE UPS GROUND SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS $100 OR MORE 
(Continental US Only)

name: Citrus Cheer
description:
Don't forget to select Free Gift Wrapping for your order, today only!

Freshen up your home and your mood with some Citrus Cheer!

The clean refreshing scents of Lemon, Lime, Grapefruit, Bergamot, and Lavender will fill your home with a stimulating and happy energy. A perfect candle for kitchens, basements, mud rooms and laundry rooms because of it's deodorizing effects. 

Makes for a great Holiday Hostess Gift!

All of our candles are made with 100% essential oils and natural soy.

*To choose a 100% natural candle please select WHITE (no color dye) as your color option. Our dyes are made of a natural plant base but are not 100% natural. .*
